education_text.0: David Ron Karger (born May 1, 1967) is an American computer scientist who is professor and a member of the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (     redirect    CSAIL) at the      Massachusetts Institute of Technology Massachusetts Institute of TechnologyKarger received a      Bachelor of Arts Bachelor of Arts degree from      Harvard University Harvard University and a PhD in      Computer science computer science from      Stanford University Stanford UniversityKarger has conducted research in the area of      Information retrieval information retrieval and      Personal information management personal information management
